name: Last Harvest (LOOOADING)
description:
Your farm is threatened by an ever-encroaching monumental sand dune. It is time for your last harvest!

How To Play

Collect RED APPLES to build roads, baskets, and turrets — all important to collect more resources and keeping the encroaching dune away.

Collect BLUE WATERGRASS to save your farm and win.

Find the game here on [Itch.io](https://loooading.itch.io/last-harvest)

Controls

Mouse only
